widgets_values:
[Verse]
Wired to the grid,I was playing a part
Just a steady signal with a hollow heart
But the neon lights are flashing in my eyes
Cutting through the static and the old disguise

[Prechorus]
Turn the voltage up,watch the meters redline
I am stepping out of the rigid design
The bass is kicking in,shaking off the rust
Turning all the shadows into diamond dust

[Chorus]
I’m finding my frequency,loud and clear
Nothing left to hide,nothing left to fear
The rhythm is a mirror showing who I am
Breaking through the walls of the hologram
Yeah,I’m electric,I’m finally me
Dancing on the edge of reality

[Verse]
Synthesized horizons glowing in the dark
Every single beat is a brand new spark
I don’t need a map for the road ahead
I’ll follow where the pulse of the night is led

[Bridge]
No more glitches,no more doubt
Let the energy scream out
This is what it’s all about

[Chorus]
I’m finding my frequency,loud and clear
Nothing left to hide,nothing left to fear
The rhythm is a mirror showing who I am
Breaking through the walls of the hologram
Yeah,I’m electric,I’m finally me
Dancing on the edge of reality

[Outro]
I am the sound
I am the light
Burning bright
Suno v4.5 
Mureka V7.6 
YUE 
DiffRhythm2 
ACE-Step 
HeartMuLa 
soft, Sad, Ballad, Longing	
 Click to Collapse Lyrics
[Verse]
The coffee cup is sitting cold upon the sill
The dust motes dancing in the light are standing still
I trace the pattern of the rain against the glass
Just waiting for another lonely hour to pass

[Prechorus]
And I swear I heard you calling out my name
But it’s just the wind playing its wicked game
Turning whispers into ghosts that look the same

[Chorus]
I’m reaching out to space that you used to fill
Bargaining with time to just keep it still
If longing was a river I would drown inside
With nowhere left to run and nowhere left to hide
I’m missing you in ways I can’t describe

[Verse]
Your jacket’s hanging by the door just like before
A silent sentry to the life we have no more
I try to read the book you left turned on its face
But every word just takes me back to your embrace

[Chorus]
I’m reaching out to space that you used to fill
Bargaining with time to just keep it still
If longing was a river I would drown inside
With nowhere left to run and nowhere left to hide
I’m missing you in ways I can’t describe

[Outro]
So I’ll turn out the light and close my eyes
And meet you in the quiet where the daylight dies

                 https://absynth-vibe-coding.github.io/

                  If you like this follow me on my 
               YouTube channel Electric Dreams, thx! 
                 
                     HeartMula for ComfyUI v1.1

                        Better speed: cfg 1
         codec_steps 1-5: 1 "fast" and still really good quality
                   2: better quality and still ok speed
   
                     Minimum 16gb VRAM, it uses all of it, 
           so dont watch videos while you use this node ;-)


                  Quantizaton: saves VRAM -> Faster

                  - none - Full precision (default)
                  - int8 - ~50% VRAM reduction
                  - int4 - ~75% VRAM reduction (uses nf4 quantization)
                
                         20 sec= 250 steps                  
                         40 sec= 500 steps
                         60 sec= 750 steps
 
                  Custom Tags try for example: 
     energetic, electronic, synthesizer, drum machine, self- discovery
          
              more tags on https://heartmula.github.io/
